data.description: I was part of a team that developed Insurance Portals using React, React - Context API, React Router, TypeScript, and Material UI.
I participated in the React Bootcamp organized by CicekSepeti and Patika.dev. I learned the basics of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React.
It was my summer internship. I learned Java SE, Java EE, and Spring Framework.
I studied Computer Engineering at Kocaeli University. I learned C, Java, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database, Operating Systems, and Computer Networks.
